Class LocalSettingsService

Namespace
EnergyPerformance.Services
Assembly
EnergyPerformance.dll

Service that provides access to local settings and acts as a container for getting and setting user's settings choices for other classes (Services, ViewModels and Models).

public class LocalSettingsService : ILocalSettingsService
